title: Sonic Gaming
body:
Hey Homies,

Currently looking for players in all positions. FYI Girls are more than welcome to play, and I encourage you to join :)

The aim of this team is to have some fun and climb the Ranked 5's ladder with fellow Summoners in a competitive but relaxed environment. Dank memes & witty puns are encouraged whilst flamers are strongly discouraged from applying.

Although the aim is to laugh, learn and enjoy yourselves I am looking for people who meet the following requirements:

1.  Minimum Platinum rank in Solo/DuoQ (season 5)
2. The ability to play most nights
3. Willingness to learn and play in a team environment
4. Able to communicate via voice chat or at the very minimum join the chat so you can listen to the team (preferably TeamSpeak)
5. Have a little bit of competitive spirit in them

To show interest in joining the team please complete questionnaire:
Questionnaire:

IGN:

Preferred Position/s:

SoloQ Rank:

Age (feel free to leave this one out:

Country/State:

Prediction for S5 World's champion (for a bit of fun):

If you have any questions, feel free to add me in League, I don't bite :)

IGN: Swagganomics
